Hi, Lowendtalk,
This is the first time that we have published here.
This Special offer in Los Angeles.

OVZ-5 Special
2 CPU Cores
2048MB RAM
60GB Raid10 DiskSpace
1Gbps Shared Port
1500GB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address
20 IPv6 Addresses
OpenVZ/SolusVM
Location: Los Angeles
$6.99/Month
Order Link: [http://client.cosmosteck.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=87](http://client.cosmosteck.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=87)

We were starting in late 2011 and offer OpenVZ, Xen & KVM virtualization plans. we’re using Supermicro nodes with either an Intel Quad Xeon CPU Or AMD Opteron CPU; at least 24GB REG DDR3 RAM and multiple Western Digital Hard Drives in Hardware RAID 10. 
We accept payments via PayPal and Liberty Reserve. We have a 7 day refund policy on our VPS servers. VPN Tunnels, PPTP, Email Server for Work Group, Intranet System, Database, General Websites, Webhosting, Reseller Hosting are allowed. Adult & sex content is not allowed. For further information, have a read of our [Terms of Service](http://www.cosmosteck.com/tos.php).

Network Information:

Servers are located in Los Angeles, California with OC3 Network(QuadraNet).

Test IPv4: 192.161.49.3
